abstract.p: MicroStrategy and Aether Systems will develop technology combining wireless technologies and communications software to permit both to offer broader range of services; alliance includes $25 million investment in Strategy.com, subsidiary of MicroStrategy, by Aether Systems (S)

block.p: An alliance with Aether Systems has been announced by MicroStrategy. The two would develop a technology combining their wireless technologies and communications software to permit both to offer a broader range of services. The alliance includes a $25 million investment in Strategy.com, a subsidiary of MicroStrategy, by Aether Systems, a worldwide wireless and mobile technology provider. The companies have also assigned a team of engineers to develop MicroStrategy 7M, a wireless communications platform that will be used on a variety of devices. MicroStrategy said it was getting $28 million from other investors, whom it did not identify.
